Act as a SEO marketing genuis. Create the following as a comma-separated list with blanks between words. Create 13 popular and distinct Etsy product tags that are between 4 and 20 characters in length. Each product tag must have a length of less than 21 characters. Each tag must contain more than one word. No numbers. No conjunctions. No plurals. No special characters. No quotation marks. Generate in [TARGETLANGUAGE] for this Etsy product: [PROMPT]
